definitions: in a manner that settles an issue convincingly or produces a definite result

examples.text: I want the person who wins the election to win decisively
samples from his body proved decisively that he was poisoned

shortDefinitions: in manner that settles issue convincingly or produces definite result

definitions: in a way that shows the ability to make decisions quickly and effectively

examples.text: the government will act decisively against all extremist activities
we must respond decisively to protect our national interests

shortDefinitions: in way that shows ability to make decisions quickly
